email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, we’d like to push the laycan to October 17-22 to better align with our loading schedule. Also, could you confirm the vessel’s draft and any restrictions at the discharge port? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, adjusting the laycan to October 17-22 is feasible. The MV Ocean Star has a draft of 18.5 meters, which should be fine for Rotterdam. No restrictions reported at the discharge port. Shall we proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton? Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $51.00 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, Houston to Rotterdam, laycan October 17-22, freight rate $51.00 per metric ton, laytime 72 hours, demurrage $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Best regards, Sarah
